column1: i can't live without your love
column2: Don't be afraid if I'll go crazy for you. Don't be surprised if I fall at your feet. I don't care about they think of me. I don't know what to do. Cause I'm falling for you (for you). When I look into your eyes. I can see me in you. Remember this time that will last until the end. When iI find you in my dreams. I just won't let you go. I'll hold you in my heart. I can't live without you. I can't live without your love. Don't be afraid if I'll go crazy for you. Don't be surprised if I fall at your feet. I don't care about they think of me. I don't know what to do. Cause I'm falling for you (for you). When I look into your eyes. I can see me in you. Remember this time that will last until the end. When I find you in my dreams. I just won't let you go. I'll hold you in my heart. I can't live without you. I can't live without your love. When I look into your eyes. I can see me in you. Remember this time that will last until the end. When I find you in my dreams. I just won't let you go. I'll hold you in my heart. I can't live without you. I can't live without your love
